quote: An idiot admires complexity, a genius admires simplicity, a physicist tries to make it simple, for an idiot anything the more complicated it is the more he will admire it, if you make something so clusterfucked he can't understand it he's gonna think you're a god cause you made it so complicated nobody can understand it. That's how they write journals in Academics, they try to make it so complicated people think you're a genius
author: Terry Davis

quote: What's reality? I don't know. When my bird was looking at my computer monitor I thought, ‘That bird has no idea what he's looking at.’ And yet what does the bird do? Does he panic? No, he can’t really panic, he just does the best he can. Is he able to live in a world where he's so ignorant? Well, he doesn't really have a choice. The bird is okay even though he doesn't understand the world. You're that bird looking at the monitor, and you're thinking to yourself, ‘I can figure this out.’ Maybe you have some bird ideas. Maybe that's the best you can do.
author: Terry Davis

quote: The debugger is very confusing. It exsists, but its very confusing. I don't understand my debugger.
author: Terry Davis

quote: I don't do ripoffs, so if its a ripoff, I don't put it on the distribution ... Nevermind, this is Asteroids.
author: Terry Davis

quote: So this is the fish. Let's make the fish bigger. Oh-oh. Let's make the mountains yellow. Ok, let's get rid of the fish. Let's make the fish small again. I don't trust that fish.
author: Terry Davis
